titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the George Pierce Baker Pageant Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Colleen Reilly

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 00:00

did.unittitle: George Pierce Baker Pageant Collection
did.abstract: The collection consists of programs, scripts, and memorabilia relating to folk, theatrical, and historical pageants collected by George Pierce Baker in the early part of the twentieth century. The collection includes a copy of the pageant George Pierce Baker authored for the American Society of Engineers.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The George Pierce Baker Pageant Collection was housed in the former Drama Library until its transfer to the Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library in 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George Pierce Baker Pageant Collection, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of programs, scripts, and memorabilia relating to folk, theatrical, and historical pageants collected by George Pierce Baker in the early part of the twentieth century. The collection includes a copy of the pageant George Pierce Baker authored for the American Society of Engineers.
